Class DataObject

An object in a DataModel.

See Data for usage examples.

Summary
  • Created with DataModel.createObject
  • Stored in Data.objects and DataModel.objects

Readonly id

id: string
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:27

Globally-unique ID.

DataObjects are stored by ID in Data.objects and DataModel.objects.

models: DataModel[]
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:20

Model metadata.

Readonly related

related: {}
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:58

The Relations in which this DataObject is the Relationship.related participant.

Each DataObject is mapped here by Relationship.type and sub-mapped by Relationship.related.

Type declaration

  • [key: number]: Relationship[]

Readonly relating

relating: {}
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:49

The Relations in which this DataObject is the Relationship.relating participant.

Each DataObject is mapped here by Relationship.type and sub-mapped by Relationship.relating.
